review: Very easy to install and I have experienced no buffering while watching movies. Great product.
author: Kimberly Mah

review: I love the fire stick so much I bought one for my brother.
author: Amazon Customer

review: I am LOVING this!!!! buy it!!!! I would not change a thing. easy to install, easy to operate.
author: Autumn

review: I was disappointed that it does not seem to mirror my Samsung desktop with Microsoft software.
author: Sandra McDonald

review: Very easy to install.  I did have some internet issues early on but they seem to have cleared up.  I love this device.  Beside traveling watching movies and TV shows on my Kindle Fire is not ideal but having this on my big screen is wonderful.
author: MaryBeth Dougherty

review: LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!!  I have not had any trouble with it at all.  The only thing I did find was with my Kindle.  It would not connect to my WiFi after I setup the Fire Stick, but after the Kindle did a couple of updates, everything started working perfectly.
author: Ms. Cynthia A. Hart
